View Live
import { Component } from '@angular/core'; @Component({ selector: 'app-projects', templateUrl: './projects.component.html', styleUrls: ['./projects.component.css'] }) export class ProjectsComponent { categories = ['All', 'Angular Projects', 'React Projects']; selectedCategory = 'All'; allProjects = [ { name: "Dynamic HRMS System", description: "A full-scale HRMS web application for managing attendance, payroll, and leave with advanced rule-based automation.", techStack: ["Angular", "PHP", "MySQL"], image: "assets/hrmAutomationIcon.webp", category: "Angular Projects", link: "#" }, { name: "UbiCRM", description: "A CRM application for managing leads, deals, and customer analytics using real-time dashboards.", techStack: ["React", "Node.js", "MySQL"], image: "assets/crms.jpg", category: "React Projects", link: "#" }, { name: "Organization Management System", description: "Manages onboarding, approval workflows, and renewals across multiple departments efficiently.", techStack: ["AngularJS", "CodeIgniter", "MySQL"], image: "assets/projects/organization.jpg", category: "Angular Projects", link: "#" } ]; filteredProjects = this.allProjects; activeProject: any = null; filterCategory(cat: string) { this.selectedCategory = cat; this.filteredProjects = cat === 'All' ? this.allProjects : this.allProjects.filter(p => p.category === cat); } openPopup(project: any) { this.activeProject = project; } closePopup() { this.activeProject = null; } }
